mapper.sql: select vehicle_id, car_num, model, company_id, status, vehicle_type, img_url, type, start_time, end_time, contacts, telephone, remark, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time from t_vehicle
mapper.select: select a.vehicle_id, a.car_num, a.model, a.company_id, a.status, a.vehicle_type, a.img_url, a.type, a.start_time, a.end_time, a.contacts, a.telephone, a.remark, a.create_by, a.create_time, a.update_by, a.update_time ,tc.company_name from t_vehicle a left join t_company tc on tc.company_id = a.company_id where a.vehicle_id = #{vehicleId}
mapper.insert:
insert ignore into t_vehicle
car_num, model, company_id, status, vehicle_type, img_url, type, start_time, end_time, contacts, telephone, user_id, remark, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time,
#{carNum}, #{model}, #{companyId}, #{status}, #{vehicleType}, #{imgUrl}, #{type}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{contacts}, #{telephone}, #{userId}, #{remark}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime},
mapper.delete:
delete from t_vehicle where vehicle_id in
#{vehicleId}
